subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Mark Cavendish, the sprint star for Team Columbia-Highroad, and his squad won the team time trial, which was the opener of the 21-stage Giro d’Italia.
snippet: Mark Cavendish, the sprint star for Team Columbia-Highroad, and his squad won the team time trial, which was the opener of the 21-stage Giro d’Italia.
